item.description:
I know this is last minute but I will be at the BSSC Blizzard at The Roxy tonight. Jonathan and a couple of other Wedelns will also make it. Tickets are available till at least noon online at http://www.bssc.com/t...
Not sure the situation with walk up sales. anyone know?

I will also have tickets available to our Wedeln Ski Film Festival (11/23) for sale for $10.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have Bright yellow/blue jacket with the logo "Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club
item.name: BSSC Blizzard at Roxy
